quote: A new Conservative government will repeal the carbon tax law and we will AX the tax for everyone for everything for good forever and for real.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre launches Conservative election campaign – March 23, 2025

description: Impose mandatory jail time on repeat offenders and ban hard drugs.
quote: We'll also bring home safety to our communities by stopping the crime for a change that means repealing catch and release liberal laws and imposing mandatory jail time on repeat offenders, banning hard drugs and offering recovery to bring our loved ones home drug free.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre launches Conservative election campaign – March 23, 2025

description: Support the creation of a national pipeline to bypass the American market and sell oil to Europe.
quote: With a national pipeline like the one the Liberals block not long ago we can go around the American market send our oil to Europe break European dependence on putin and break our dependence on the United States of America.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre launches Conservative election campaign – March 23, 2025

description: Massive tax cut on work, investment, energy, home building, and making stuff in Canada
quote: It will mean bringing in a massive beautiful patriotic bring itome tax cut on work investment energy Home Building and making stuff in Canada a tax cut that will allow you to get ahead through your own hard work with lower income tax
transcript_title: LIVE: The same Carney-Trudeau crew

description: Remove GST from homes to save up to $50,000
quote: we'll take GST off homes so that you can save up to 50 Grand
transcript_title: LIVE: The same Carney-Trudeau crew

description: Incentivize municipalities to speed up permits, free up land, and cut development charges
quote: while we incentivize municipalities to speed up permits free up land and cut development charges

quote: we'll ask the carbon tax forever for good and for real

description: Secure borders and strengthen the military

description: Fire government officials who fail in their duties
quote: I believe that government officials should be accountable for their decisions and when they fail government officials should be fired

description: Confront President Trump directly and respond with counter-tariffs.
